name: OK DOOMER (Ragator)
description:
This short game was made in GameMaker Studio 2, expanding on a tutorial I followed.

It is a basic 2D Platform Shooter, aim and shoot your way through the levels.

The game was made with an AZERTY layout in mind :
Z to jump
Q goes left
D goes right

The game also supports a twin-stick controller layout, jumping with A and shooting with the Right Trigger.
